portfolio.name: Portfolio

blackmt.name: BlackMT
blackmt.description: BlackMT was my Minecraft server that I ran from early 2020 through about May 2021, I had a really great time coding and working on this project.

emojieyes.description: Assignment that I did for my class CSS Art at school.

sumo.name: Sumo
sumo.description: This was a private plugin but I made it public after it wasn't really being used privately anymore.

rijksmuseumbo.name: Rijksmuseum Beroepsopdracht
rijksmuseumbo.description: This was another assignment for school part of the first sprint of my so called 'Beroeps Opdracht'.

2faplugin.name: AdvancedAuth
2faplugin.description: This was a project that I created pretty simple, don't know why I called it 'Advanced'Auth lol.

infiniteparkour.name: Infinite Parkour
infiniteparkour.description: This was a project that I did for my application to DevRoom as Plugin Developer, it generates random blocks for you to jump to (like the title said you can go on infinitely)

fuserewind.name: FuseRewind Clip Bot
fuserewind.description: This Discord Bot lets users submit their clips so you can review them they will also automatically be uploaded to Google Drive after reviewal.

villagercraft_support.name: VillagerCraft Support Bot
villagercraft_support.description: I've created this product for a client through DevRoom, it is a ticket support bot with all the core features.
